aka: I Saw the Face of the Devil
awards:
第76届戛纳电影节(2023)
　　酷儿棕榈奖 短片酷儿棕榈奖(提名)

writer.name: 朱莉娅·科瓦尔斯基 Julia Kowalski

director.name: 朱莉娅·科瓦尔斯基 Julia Kowalski

this_title: J'ai vu le visage du diable
trans_title: I Saw the Face of the Devil
introduction: In a small town in northern Poland, 18-year-old Majka is convinced that she is possessed. She decides to rely on the skills of a local priest to expel the demon, which doesn’t stop her from jokingly referencing William Friedkin’s The Exorcist with her best friend. The exorcism sessions are no less staggering than the iconic film.
foreign_title: J'ai vu le visage du diable
